page.title: 04Transport in Consall area
page.content: ew people do not have some sort of transport even if it is just a bike. This is because people have the need to move from one place to another for reasons like shopping,leisure,visiting people and work.Some cars or any vehicles are so "high tec" that they cost enormous amounts of money to buy.A normal family car can vary in price depending on the size and shape. Many families now have more than one car which is vital in such a rural area as the bus service is very limited.Some areas have no services at all so the people must rely entirely on their own transport. The bus is a declining form of transport with the rise of the motor car,other forms of transport in the area have also declined,the railway along the Churnet Valley is no longer used for passengers and has limited use
